file_content.text: Thank you for everything. I'll stay here until I'm healed.
The Sith Beast-Lord is dead. His army's attacks on our people are over.
Thank you. It helps knowing my Master died for a greater good.
The soldiers say General Nadab sent you here. I'm sure he'll want to know of your mission's success.
I will stay here until I'm healthy enough for the journey back to Tython. May the Force be with you.
The Sith Beast-Lord must be stopped. Hurry!
The comm channels are clear. I found Master Heljus, but she's hurt!
Listen to me, all of you... the Sith secret weapon is no machine. It's a man. A Beast-Lord of Onderon, powerful in the dark side.
A Beast-Lord? Onderon?
The planet Onderon's Beast-Lords dominate predators with their minds. Direct their actions. But this Sith... many times more powerful.
We're coming to help you.
No--no. You must focus on the Sith. He threatens all of you.
You know this for a fact?
The thing that attacked our expedition dragged the survivors back to its lair. I followed. Thought I could save our friends. I was wrong.
The Sith Beast-Lord was there, waiting. Sent dozens of creatures at me. I barely escaped to send this final message.
Master, no... we can still save you!
It's too late for me, Padawan--but not for you. The Sith has gathered an army of beasts to destroy our forces. Stop him.
Leave it to me.
Maybe the Sith will negotiate?
Don't make my mistake. Our enemy is more animal than man. He cannot be reasoned with.
Animals armies don't scare me.
I've seen what those things do. They'll leave nothing alive.
I'm transmitting coordinates to the enemy's lair. Hurry. May the Force be with you....
I'd offer to help, but in my state I'd only get in your way.
Please... make that Sith pay for all the suffering he's caused.
We have to clear the comm channels. Farren Dulz knows what to do. Speak to him.
Whatever is slaughtering our people out here is recorded on these sensor logs. Captain Armaruk thought you'd want to know.
The captain was right to send you, but I'm not sure how much I can help. My Master--our team--they're missing.
We were investigating a remote area during a snowstorm. Something attacked us. I never saw it. Just heard the screams.
My Master created an avalanche that carried us to safety, but we were separated. I came here to heal. My Master hasn't returned yet.
Don't worry, Jedi are tough.
Sometimes, I sense my Master's presence. At least, I think I can.
You should be in the medbay.
It is my duty as a Padawan to remain here until my Master returns.
Time to find a new Master.
Master Heljus is strong in the Force. She can't be dead. I would have felt it.
We came here hunting rumors of a new secret weapon. We believe the Sith have deployed it somewhere on Hoth.
Intelligence reports indicate the device twists native wildlife into a weapon. These sensor logs prove it. My Master must see this. We have to find him!
Stay here. I'll go look.
It isn't that simple. The avalanche that carried me to safety disoriented me. I don't even know where to start the search.
Do we really need him?
Whatever attacked us was just like the thing your sensor logs picked up. I'm only a Padawan. My Master has the answers you seek.
What is this "we" nonsense?
Look at me. I wouldn't last an hour out there.
I've been trying to reach my Master's holocom, but White Maw pirates are jamming all frequencies. We need to focus on that problem first.
A soldier named Farren Dulz has a plan to stop White Maw from blocking our comms. You help him, and I'll find my Master.
Something's hunting our people out there. If you're traveling on the plains, may the Force be with you.
